statements.insert: insert into t_warehouse(warehouse_id, wh_code, wh_name, wh_name_en, wh_address, wh_contacter, wh_tel, wh_fax, wh_status, wh_remark, is_default, create_user_id, create_user_name, create_time) values(#ID#, #Code#, #Name#, #EnglishName#, #Address#, #Contacter#, #Tel#, #Fax#, 1, #Remark#, #IsDefault#, #CreateUserID#, #CreateUserName#, getdate())
statements.update: update t_warehouse set wh_code = #Code#, wh_name = #Name#, wh_name_en = #EnglishName#, wh_address = #Address#, wh_contacter = #Contacter#, wh_tel = #Tel#, wh_fax = #Fax#, is_default = #IsDefault#, wh_remark = #Remark#, modify_user_id = #ModifyUserID#, modify_user_name = #ModifyUserName#, modify_time = getdate() where warehouse_id = #ID#
statements.select: select a.warehouse_id, a.wh_code, a.wh_name, a.wh_name_en, a.wh_address, a.wh_contacter, a.wh_tel, a.wh_fax, a.wh_status, a.wh_remark, a.is_default, a.create_user_id, a.create_user_name, a.create_time, a.modify_user_id, a.modify_user_name, a.modify_time, a.sys_modify_stamp, case a.wh_status when 1 then '正常' else '停用' end as wh_status_desc, case a.is_default when 1 then '是' else '否' end as is_default_desc, c.unit_id, c.unit_name, c.unit_code, c.unit_name_short from t_warehouse a, t_unit_warehouse b, t_unit c where a.warehouse_id=b.warehouse_id and b.unit_id=c.unit_id

select count(*) from t_warehouse where wh_code=#WarehouseCode#
warehouse_id <> #WarehouseID#

select count(b.warehouse_id) from t_warehouse b, t_unit_warehouse c, t_unit d where b.warehouse_id=c.warehouse_id and c.unit_id=d.unit_id
d.unit_name like '%' + #UnitName# + '%'
b.wh_code like '%' + #Code# + '%'
b.wh_name like '%' + #Name# + '%'
b.wh_contacter like '%' + #Contacter# + '%'
b.wh_tel like '%' + #Tel# + '%'
b.wh_status = #Status#

select a.* from ( select rownum_=row_number() over(order by b.wh_code), b.*, case b.wh_status when 1 then '正常' else '停用' end as wh_status_desc, case b.is_default when 1 then '是' else '否' end as is_default_desc, d.unit_id, d.unit_name, d.unit_code, d.unit_name_short from t_warehouse b, t_unit_warehouse c, t_unit d where b.warehouse_id=c.warehouse_id and c.unit_id=d.unit_id
d.unit_name like '%' + #UnitName# + '%'
b.wh_code like '%' + #Code# + '%'
b.wh_name like '%' + #Name# + '%'
b.wh_contacter like '%' + #Contacter# + '%'
b.wh_tel like '%' + #Tel# + '%'
b.wh_status = #Status#
) a where rownum_ > #StartRow# and rownum_<=#EndRow#
statements.update: update t_warehouse set wh_status = #WarehouseStatus#, modify_user_id = #UserID#, modify_time = getdate() where warehouse_id = #WarehouseID#
